pages.text: $(li)The Illusioner are tricky wizards that are armed with a Bow.$(br)$(li)Its arrows can inflict Blindness effect, hindering your vision.$(br)$(li)They are able to create illusions of itselft, in this moment, the Illusioner is completely immune to any kind of attack.
$(li)The Illusioner can only be found in a Raid.
